revision.text:
{{Infobox person | name = Venkat Viswanathan | image = | caption = Venkat Viswanathan | birth_date = | citizenship = [[India]] | alma_mater = {{nowrap|[[Indian Institute of Management Calcutta|IIM Calcutta]]
[[Indian Institute of Technology Madras|IIT Madras]]}} | occupation = [[Chief Executive Officer|CEO]] of [[LatentView]] | predecessor = | awards = }} '''Venkat Viswanathan''' is an Indian entrepreneur and business executive. He is the founder and [[Chief Executive Officer]] of [[LatentView|LatentView Analytics Corporation]], a [[predictive analytics]] and [[enterprise decision management]] services firm based in [[Princeton, New Jersey]] that provides decision science and analytics services.{{Cite news |url=http://www.thehindubusinessline.com/todays-paper/tp-eworld/article1013082.ece |title=Plumbing the depths for gyaan |author=K Bharat Kumar |accessdate=9 February 2012 |publisher=[[Business Line]] |date=January 18, 2010 |location=}}{{Cite news |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/Mining-Big-Data/articleshow/10237389.cms |title=Mining Big Data |author=Narayanan Krishnaswami |accessdate=9 February 2012 |publisher=[[The Times of India]] |date=Oct 5, 2011 |location=}} Viswanathan holds a degree in engineering from [[Indian Institute of Technology Madras]] and an MBA from [[Indian Institute of Management Calcutta]]. He worked at [[Essar Group]], [[ICRA Limited]] and [[Cognizant Technology Solutions]] before founding LatentView in 2006. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata | NAME = Viswanathan, Venkat | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Businessperson | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Viswanathan, Venkat}} [[Category:Indian Institute of Management Calcutta alumni]] [[Category:Indian businesspeople]] [[Category:Indian chief executives]] [[Category:Living people]]
